channel.title: Authors on Chapel Language Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Chapel Language Blog

item.title: Brad Chamberlain
item.description: Brad is the technical lead of the Chapel project and the editor of the Chapel blog.

item.title: Brandon Neth
item.description: Brandon is a member of the Advanced Programming Team and leads the Community Management subteam.

item.title: Michelle Strout
item.description: Michelle is the senior engineering manager of the Chapel project.

item.title: Michael Ferguson
item.description: Michael is a member of the Chapel team at HPE and currently leads the compiler rework subteam.

item.title: Daniel Fedorin
item.description: Daniel is a compiler developer on the Chapel team who also does web development for this blog.

item.title: Jade Abraham
item.description: Jade is a member of the Chapel team at HPE.

item.title: Engin Kayraklioglu
item.description: Engin is a member of the Chapel team at HPE and currently leads the GPU subteam.

item.title: John Hartman
item.description: John Hartman is a member of the Chapel team at HPE.

item.title: Jeremiah Corrado
item.description: Jeremiah is a member of the Chapel team at HPE focused on language stabilization.

item.title: Lydia Duncan
item.description: Lydia is a member of the Chapel team at HPE and currently leads the stabilization subteam.

item.title: Ahmad Rezaii
item.description: Ahmad is a developer on the Chapel team.

item.title: Andy Stone
item.description: Andy Stone is a member of the Chapel team at HPE.

item.title: Shreyas Khandekar
item.description: Shreyas is a member of the Chapel team at HPE

item.title: Scott Bachman
item.description: Scott is visiting scholar from NCAR working with the Chapel team.
